item.title: Using R and Python Together
item.description: Have you ever had the urge to do things in two languages at the same time? It’s literally code-switching. When you’re at home and you’re talking to your mom or maybe your grandma, and you unwittingly switch between your home language and English? Your mom: තේ බොමු ද? You: Sure! Do we have any කිඹුල් බනිස්? (maybe this is not a universal experience, but it is a common experience for a good chunk of people.
